```{r set variables}
DataIn <- "XXXX"
TargetFile <- "YYYY"
  
```


```{r import data}
library(readxl)
library(purrr)

xlsx_path <- path.expand(Sys.getenv("MTA_EXCEL_PATH"))
stopifnot(file.exists(xlsx_path))

sheets <- excel_sheets(xlsx_path)
data_list <- setNames(map(sheets, ~ read_excel(xlsx_path, sheet = .x)), sheets)

data_list[["Raw Data"]]
print(data_list)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
